function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Workforce reduction in public agencies impacting permit oversight for construction projects","Impact":"Increased delay in project completion due to limited capacity to oversee permits","Mitigation":"Developing an alternative permit oversight system or increasing resources to manage permits","Technologies":"Digital permit management systems, automation for permit processing","People":"Construction stakeholders, project developers, public agencies","Owner":"Public agencies, government"}]}
